info.title: Payment Request Following Raw ISO20022
info.description: Initiate a request for payment in real-time schemes with Request and Response based on ISO20022 pain.013.001.05/pain.014.001.05.
info.x-finastra-short-description: Initiate a request for payment in real-time schemes with Request and Response based on ISO20022 pain.013.001.05/pain.014.001.05

post.description: initiate a new real time Creditor Payment Activation Request

201.description: successfully accept the payment initiation request accepted

Location.description: relative URL to track the payment

400.description: The payment does not pass scheme validation

401.description: Authorization has been denied for this request. Please check your subscription key or user type.

post.description: reject a new Real Time payment
post.summary: reject response for request for payment

parameters.name: PaymentInitiationRespond
parameters.description: the reponse to request for payment

201.description: successfully accept the payment reject respond

Location.description: relative URL to track the payment

400.description: The payment does not pass scheme validation

401.description: Authorization has been denied for this request. Please check your subscription key or user type.

post.description: accept a new Real Time payment
post.summary: accept response for request for payment

parameters.name: PaymentInitiationRespond
parameters.description: the reponse to request for payment

201.description: successfully accept the payment reject respond

Location.description: relative URL to track the payment

400.description: The payment does not pass scheme validation

401.description: Authorization has been denied for this request. Please check your subscription key or user type.

get.description: get the status of a payment

401.description: Authorization has been denied for this request. Please check your subscription key or user type.

id.description: Initiation ID will be used for flow selection as well as rules identifications

subId.description: Additional place holder for initiation ID incase another level of granularity is required in flow selection etc?

schmeNm.description: for cases where target schema is definitive (e.g. PSD2 initiating SEPA Inst payment) the target schema needs to be specified as it can not go elsewhere.

saveOnError.description: : defines whether the payment will be stored when business error occurs. Default value = true

Amt.description: The amount in the specified currency

ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode.description: Active Or Historic Currency Code following ISO 4217
ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode.title: ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode

AddressType2Code.description: Identifies the nature of the postal address
AddressType2Code.title: AddressType2Code

BranchAndFinancialInstitutionIdentificat.description: Cdtr,Debtr, IntrmyAgt information. i.e. If IntermediaryAgent2 is present, then IntermediaryAgent1 must be present.
BranchAndFinancialInstitutionIdentificat.title: BranchAndFinancialInstitutionIdentification5

Cheque7.description: Provided information will be sent as is
Cheque7.title: Cheque7

DecimalNumber.description: Amount of the individual transaction contained in the message.
DecimalNumber.title: DecimalNumber

DocumentType6Code.description: This is DocumentTypeCodes in Data Element Name. DocumentType5Code and DocumentType6Code are comprised of the same code sets with the exception of PUOR (Purchase Order) that is included in DocumentType6Code.
DocumentType6Code.title: DocumentType6Code

ExternalClearingSystemIdentification1Cod.description: Clearing codes have to be in specific, country dependant format. They always start with country's payment system prefix (5 characters, referenced as code in the ISO's table) and are followed by varying number of digits/letters (referenced as bank identifier in ISO's table)
ExternalClearingSystemIdentification1Cod.title: ExternalClearingSystemIdentification1Code

BirthISODate.description: As defined in ISO20022 standard for birth dates
BirthISODate.title: BirthISODate

ISODateTime.description: Date and time in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format
ISODateTime.title: ISODateTime

Max15NumericText.description: Number of individual transactions contained in the message. Should be set to 1
Max15NumericText.title: Max15NumericText

PartyIdentification43.description: Provided information will be sent as is
PartyIdentification43.title: PartyIdentification43

PaymentMethod4Code.description: Specifies the transfer method that will be used to transfer an amount of money. Must be 'TRF'.
PaymentMethod4Code.title: PaymentMethod4Code

PaymentTypeInformation19.description: PmtTpInf may not be given in both 'PmtInf' and in 'PmtInf/CdtTrfTxInf' simultaneously
PaymentTypeInformation19.title: PaymentTypeInformation19

PercentageRate.description: Rate expressed as a percentage, ie, in hundredths, eg, 0.7 is 7/10 of a percent, and 7.0 is 7%. Format:- fractionDigits: 10 totalDigits: 11
PercentageRate.title: PercentageRate

Priority2Code.description: Indicator of the urgency or order of importance that the instructing party would like the instructed party to apply to the processing of the instruction. Note: 'NORM' or 'HIGH' may be used
Priority2Code.title: Priority2Code

SupplementaryData1.description: Provided information will be sent as is
SupplementaryData1.title: SupplementaryData1

TaxInformation3.description: Provided information will be sent as is
TaxInformation3.title: TaxInformation3

TaxInformation4.description: Provided information will be sent as is
TaxInformation4.title: TaxInformation4

TaxParty1.description: Party on the credit side of the transaction to which the tax applies. This message item is composed of the TaxId,RegnId and TaxTp with minLength: 1 and maxLength:35
TaxParty1.title: TaxParty1

ChargeBearerType1Code.description: If ChargeBearer is present, then CreditTransferTransactionInformation/ChargeBearer is not allowed.If CreditTransferTransactionInformation/ChargeBearer is present, then ChargeBearer is not allowed.CreditTransferTransactionInformation/ChargeBearer and ChargeBearer may both be absent.
ChargeBearerType1Code.title: ChargeBearerType1Code

ChequeDelivery1Code.description: If PaymentMethod is CHK and CreditTransferTransactionInformation/ChequeInstruction/DeliveryMethod/Code is present and different from MLFA, CRFA, RGFA or PUFA, then CreditTransferTransactionInformation/CreditorAgent is not allowed.
ChequeDelivery1Code.title: ChequeDelivery1Code

ChequeType2Code.description: Specifies the type of cheque to be issued
ChequeType2Code.title: ChequeType2Code

Instruction3Code.description: If InstructionForCreditorAgent/Code contains CHQB (BankCheque), then CreditorAccount is not allowed.
Instruction3Code.title: Instruction3Code

PaymentMethod7Code.description: Specifies the transfer method that will be used to transfer an amount of money. Must be 'TRF'.
PaymentMethod7Code.title: PaymentMethod7Code

RegulatoryReportingType1Code.description: Identifies whether the regulatory reporting information applies to the debit side, to the credit side or to both debit and credit sides of the transaction.
RegulatoryReportingType1Code.title: RegulatoryReportingType1Code

RemittanceLocationMethod2Code.description: Method used to deliver the remittance advice information.
RemittanceLocationMethod2Code.title: RemittanceLocationMethod2Code

TaxRecordPeriod1Code.description: Identification of the period related to the tax payment
TaxRecordPeriod1Code.title: TaxRecordPeriod1Code

TransactionGroupStatus3Code.description: Specifies the status of the payment information group
TransactionGroupStatus3Code.title: TransactionGroupStatus3Code

TransactionIndividualStatus3Code.description: Common transaction status for all individual transactions reported
TransactionIndividualStatus3Code.title: TransactionIndividualStatus3Code

ExternalPurpose1Code.description: ExternalPurpose1Code is used for defining the purpose of the payment
ExternalPurpose1Code.title: ExternalPurpose1Code
